# Satya Nadella’s Post

[!\[\]()](https://www.linkedin.com/in/satyanadella?trk=public_post_feed-actor-image)

[Satya Nadella](https://www.linkedin.com/in/satyanadella?trk=public_post_feed-actor-name)

Satya Nadella is an Influencer

Chairman and CEO at Microsoft

48m

- [Report this post](/uas/login?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Fposts%2Fsatyanadella_introducing-microsoft-agent-framework-microsoft-activity-7379202146988318720-WDPf&trk=public_post_ellipsis-menu-semaphore-sign-in-redirect&guestReportContentType=POST&_f=guest-reporting)

AI Economics depends on efficient token factories and highly performant agent frameworks that deliver enterprise outcomes!

That is why we are excited about Microsoft Agent Framework. You can now build, orchestrate, and scale multi-agent systems in Azure AI Foundry using this framework.

It brings together our best-in-class runtime from AutoGen with the enterprise foundations of Semantic Kernel, with compliance, observability, and deep integration out of the box.

Can’t wait to see what you build! [https://lnkd.in/g34DPfb3](https://www.linkedin.com/redir/redirect?url=https%3A%2F%2Flnkd%2Ein%2Fg34DPfb3&urlhash=IJu5&trk=public_post-text)

- [Report this comment](/uas/login?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Fposts%2Fsatyanadella_introducing-microsoft-agent-framework-microsoft-activity-7379202146988318720-WDPf&trk=public_post_comment_ellipsis-menu-semaphore-sign-in-redirect&guestReportContentType=COMMENT&_f=guest-reporting)

This is precisely what the enterprise AI space has been waiting for! The combo of AutoGen's runtime with Semantic Kernel's enterprise features sounds like a game-changer. Having compliance and observability baked in from the start is huge - no more retrofitting security after the fact. The "token factories" framing is spot on too. Everyone's talking about AI agents, but not enough people are thinking about the economics of actually running them at scale. What's been the most significant bottleneck you've seen companies hit when they try to move from proof-of-concept agent demos to actual production multi-agent systems? Is it the orchestration complexity, the token costs, or something else entirely? [Satya Nadella](https://www.linkedin.com/in/satyanadella?trk=public_post_comment-text)

Title: AI Economics depends on efficient token factories and highly performant agent frameworks that deliver enterprise outcomes! That is why we are excited about Microsoft Agent Framework. You can now build, orchestrate, and scale multi-agent systems in Azure AI Foundry using this framework. [See more.]
Author: stclarke
Description: The post [AI Economics depends on efficient token factories and highly performant agent frameworks that deliver enterprise outcomes! That is why we are excited about Microsoft Agent Framework. You can now build, orchestrate, and scale multi-agent systems in Azure AI Foundry using this framework. \[See more.\]](https://www.linkedin.com/posts/satyanadella_introducing-microsoft-agent-framework-microsoft-activity-7379202146988318720-WDPf) appeared first on [Source](https://news.microsoft.com/source).
